attributes.action: MAKE HIS MARK IN HISTORY BY BEING THE FIRST TO INTRODUCE A DEMOCRATIC PROPORTIONAL REPRESENTATION VOTING SYSTEM, IN THIS COUNTRY, BEFORE THE NEXT GENERAL ELECTION.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: HE IS SUCH A NICE MAN, HE SHOULD LEAVE SOMETHING WE CAN REMEMBER HIM BY, WHEN HE GOES.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
